content: stuffing the head now we start working on the tentacles fpsc chain 50 starting from the 2nd chain from the hook make 2sc in each chain until the end fpsc on the next stitch in round 25 to attach the tentacle x8 when you have finished all the tentacles make a slip_stitch into the beginning of the first tentacle to finish this round 26 switch back to 2mm hook 8dec and use a sewing needle to close the whole by going under each front loop of the decreases and pulling tightly so as to prevent the filling from coming out secure the yarn and hide it you can finish it here or you can give it an embroidered face like i did since the octopuses i make go into charity danish octo project for preemies - https //www spruttegruppen dk/danish-octo-project- english/ i try to make them as colorful and as fun as possible so that they may bring the joy to the smallest of heroes faces thank you for choosing this pattern i hope you enjoyed making the octopus as much as i do every day - love milu
